actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend section 204 of the Agricultural Act of 1956.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, under the Agricultural Act of 1956, to issue regulations governing the entry into the United States of agricultural commodities or textiles which are the exports of any country not party to a multilateral or bilateral agreement under such Act to limit the import of such articles.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 204 of the Agricultural Act of 1956.
